title: Mobile Learning Multimedia Development for Enhancing Secondary English Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English grammar and vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: Mobile learning content development process applying the 4D Model (Define-Design-Develop-Disseminate) to enhance practical English communication skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain the requirements analysis and application methods for each stage of the 4D development model.
Learners can apply multimedia design principles for mobile learning to improve English communication skills.
Learners can revise and enhance multimedia prototypes by incorporating learner feedback.
Learners can suggest practical methods for applying validated mobile learning content to real-world educational settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
